name: auto-jest-cucumber
description: Library for automatic setup of jest-cucumber tests based on .feature files and JavaScript step definitions.

scripts.np: git remote rm origin && (np --publish false --cleanup false || echo Error on np) && git remote add origin git@github.com:TexKiller/auto-jest-cucumber.git && git push --set-upstream origin master

author: Faister Cabrera Carvalho
